key_title: Key to the species of Vicia

source.author: Jeanes, J.A.
source.title: Fabaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae
source.citation: Modified from: Jeanes, J.A. (1996). Fabaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Flowers 1-many; peduncles more than 1.5 mm long; stipules lacking glands
Flowers 1–4; peduncles 0–1.5 mm long; stipules usually with a prominent central gland
Corolla 2–8 mm long; pod 8–20 mm long
Corolla 10–25 mm long; pod 20–50 mm long
Leaves with 4–10 pairs of leaflets; corolla 2–5 mm long; pod usually 1–2-seeded
Leaves with 3–6 pairs of leaflets; corolla 5–8 mm long; pod 3–4-seeded
Leaflets linear to elliptic; calyx teeth unequal; pod 12–20 mm long, 5–8 mm wide, glabrous
Leaflets linear to lanceolate; calyx teeth subequal; pod 6–12 mm long, 2–4 mm wide, densely pubescent
Racemes 1–5-flowered; base of calyx slightly gibbous
Racemes 2–40-flowered; base of calyx distinctly gibbous
